kpi.name: M5008C12

kpi_info.title: MAXIMUM USED CE FOR R99 DL
kpi_info.use: The maximum amount of CE used for R99 users in DL, obtained by sampling with predefined sampling period for the measurement period duration. UPDATED: The counter is updated over the measurement period. The value of the counter is the maximum value of all samples.

kpi.kpi_alias: MAXIMUM USED CE FOR R99 DL
